channel.title: Database, IoT on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in Database, IoT on David G. Simmons

item.title: Running InfluxDB on an ARTIK-520
item.description: Let’s face it, the IoT is about data. I said it just a few weeks ago. It’s about collecting data. LotsÂ of data. But it’s actually about a lot more than just collecting data. Simply collecting data doesn’t really get you anywhere if all you do is collect it. To be useful, IoT data has to be relevant, accurate, and actionable. That last part is the key, really. Actionable data. In order to make your data actionable, you have to be able to analyze it, in real time preferably.
